CustomField.description: Text area to call out changes to existing processes and put justifications for any changes this requirement will add
CustomField.inlineHelpText: OPTIONAL: Update this field to include additional context and benefits to the changes. Can be used to flesh out the business justification or impact to current state when there's a more contentious change. Includes the "what's in it for me?" language.
CustomField.label: Change Context + Benefit
